implementation.functions:
local RulesEngine
function RulesEngine_startup (lul_device) luup.log("RulesEngine startup") RulesEngine = require("L_RulesEngine1") if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then return RulesEngine.startup(lul_device) else return false, "Can't load library" end end

action.name: SetTarget
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.setTarget(lul_device, lul_settings.newTargetValue) end return 4, nil

action.name: LoadRules
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.loadRuleFile(lul_settings.fileName, false) end return 4, nil

action.name: EnableRule
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.enableRule(lul_settings.ruleId) end return 4, nil

action.name: DisableRule
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.disableRule(lul_settings.ruleId) end return 4, nil

action.name: SetRuleArming
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.setRuleArming(lul_settings.ruleId, lul_settings.arming) end return 4, nil

action.name: SetRuleAcknowledgement
action.job: if (RulesEngine ~= nil) then RulesEngine.setRuleAcknowledgement(lul_settings.ruleId, lul_settings.acknowledgement) end return 4, nil
